titles: An apologie, or aunswer in defence of the Church of England concerninge the state of religion vsed in the same. Newly set forth in Latin, and nowe translated into Englishe.
author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.
Parker, Matthew, 1504-1575.
notes: A translation of: Jewel, John.  Apologia Ecclesiæ Anglicanæ.
"Trans[lation]. said to have been supervised by Abp. M. Parker"--STC.
Running title reads: An apologie of the Churche of Englande.
Quires A and B are in two different settings. Folger also reports a copy lacking a colophon.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Church of England --  Doctrines --  Early works to 1800.
